top_netflix_series.name: Stranger Things
top_netflix_series.description: In 1980s Indiana, a group of young friends witness supernatural forces and secret government exploits. As they search for answers, the children unravel a series of extraordinary mysteries.

top_netflix_series.name: The Queen's Gambit
top_netflix_series.description: Orphaned at a young age, Beth Harmon discovers an astonishing talent for chess while struggling with addiction. As she rises to the top of the chess world, she battles personal demons and societal expectations.

top_netflix_series.name: Bridgerton
top_netflix_series.description: In Regency London, wealthy families present their daughters at court. The scandalous life of the powerful Bridgerton family is revealed through the eyes of the witty and mysterious Lady Whistledown.

top_netflix_series.name: Squid Game
top_netflix_series.description: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits — with deadly high stakes.

top_netflix_series.name: The Witcher
top_netflix_series.description: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

top_netflix_series.name: Ozark
top_netflix_series.description: A financial adviser drags his family from Chicago to the Missouri Ozarks, where he must launder money to appease a drug boss.

top_netflix_series.name: The Crown
top_netflix_series.description: This drama follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

top_netflix_series.name: Black Mirror
top_netflix_series.description: This anthology series taps into our collective unease with the modern world. Each stand-alone episode is a sharp, suspenseful tale exploring themes of contemporary techno-paranoia.

top_netflix_series.name: You
top_netflix_series.description: A charming bookstore manager with a sinister side uses social media and the internet to become close to his objects of affection.

top_netflix_series.name: Money Heist (La Casa de Papel)
top_netflix_series.description: A criminal mastermind who goes by 'The Professor' has a plan to pull off the biggest heist in recorded history — to print billions of euros in the Royal Mint of Spain.

top_netflix_series.name: Sex Education
top_netflix_series.description: Inexperienced Otis channels his sex therapist mom to help fellow students navigate tricky situations. A British comedy-drama series.

top_netflix_series.name: Narcos
top_netflix_series.description: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar, as well as the many other drug kingpins who plagued the country through the years.

top_netflix_series.name: The Umbrella Academy
top_netflix_series.description: Reunited by their father's death, estranged siblings with extraordinary powers uncover shocking family secrets — and a looming threat to humanity.

top_netflix_series.name: Emily in Paris
top_netflix_series.description: When ambitious marketing executive Emily Cooper lands her dream job in Paris, she embraces a new life of adventure and challenges.

top_netflix_series.name: Virgin River
top_netflix_series.description: Seeking a fresh start, a nurse practitioner moves from Los Angeles to a remote Northern California town and is surprised by what — and who — she finds.

top_netflix_series.name: Lupin
top_netflix_series.description: Inspired by the adventures of Arsène Lupin, gentleman thief Assane Diop sets out to avenge his father for an injustice inflicted by a wealthy family.

top_netflix_series.name: Sweet Magnolias
top_netflix_series.description: Lifelong friends Maddie, Helen and Dana Sue lift each other up as they juggle relationships, family, and careers in the small Southern town of Serenity.

top_netflix_series.name: Outer Banks
top_netflix_series.description: A teenager from the wrong side of the tracks enlists his three best friends to hunt for a legendary treasure linked to his father's disappearance.

top_netflix_series.name: Maid
top_netflix_series.description: A young mother escapes an abusive relationship, taking a job as a maid to provide a better future for her daughter.

top_netflix_series.name: Unorthodox
top_netflix_series.description: A young woman raised in a strict Orthodox Jewish community in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, flees to Berlin to start a new life.

top_netflix_series.name: The Haunting of Hill House
top_netflix_series.description: Flashing between past and present, a fractured family confronts haunting memories of their old home and the terrifying events that drove them from it.
